Class-Cleric 20 -- Male Versatile Human Cleric: 20

Background: Acrobat Deity: Abadar

Feature Notes:

Deity: Has the Anathema and Sanctification features
Divine Font: 1 selection
Doctrine: 1 selection
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 5 from any)
Holy: Has the holy trait
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Sanctification: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 10 from any)
Unholy: Has the unholy trait
Versatile Human: General Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Warpriest: Has the Deadly Simplicity feature
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Adopted Ancestry (Goblin): Can take Goblin ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by Abadar
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Cooking Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Absalom Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Crafting: +30 (intelligence; master) Nature: +24 (wisdom; untrained)

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Baking Lore): Skill Trained (Baking Lore)
Skill Training (Deception): Skill Trained (Deception)
Skill Training (Desert Lore): Skill Trained (Desert Lore)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed, suffering a -5 Survival penalty
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 8 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Magic Hands: Successful Medicine to Treat Wounds restores d10s and +20 Hit Points
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Forest): +1 Survival in Forest
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 228 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity (3 max); expert) Class DC: Cleric: 36 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: Padded Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Crossbow (+30 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; master); Fist (+28 1d4+4 B; strength; expert); Flail (+28 1d6+4 B; strength; expert); Longsword (+28 1d8+4 S/P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Cloistered Cleric: Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Deadly Simplicity: Crossbow inflicts +1 damage die step
Deity: Attack Trained (Crossbow)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Divine Defense: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Lasting Armament: Has increased Sanctify Armament effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Shortbow): Weapon Familiarity (Shortbow)
Warpriest's Armor: Defense Expert (Heavy Armor)
Warpriest: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)/Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Attack Master (Crossbow)
Channel Smite: (2) Adds the damage from a 1-action Heal or Harm to a melee Strike
Channeling Block: Can expend a Harm or Heal with Shield Block to add 1d8 per spell rank to the shield's Hardness
Cloistered Cleric: Critical hits with a crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Divine Rebuttal: (R) Successful crossbow Strike against an adjacent foe gives allies +2 vs. its triggering magic effect, or +3 on a critical hit
Emblazon Antimagic: Can use Emblazon Armament to instead cause a shield to give a save bonus vs. magic and Shield Block vs. spells, or to cause 1 critical hit with a weapon to allow a +10 counteract attempt vs. a spell
Emblazon Armament: 10 min process gives a shield +1 Hardness or a weapon +1 HP damage for 1 year
Emblazon Energy: Can use Emblazon Armament to instead cause a shield to give a save bonus and Shield Block vs. a chosen energy type, and to give it resistance 10 if the energy matches a known domain spell, or to cause a weapon to inflict +1d4 HP energy type damage, or +1d6 HP if the energy matches a known domain spell
Inviolable: Successful attacks on self inflict 3d6 HP spirit, holy, or unholy on the attacker
Rapid Response: (R) Strides with +10 Speed toward an ally reduced to 0 Hit Points
Rebounding Smite: (R) Missed Strike using Channel Smite allows retargeting the Harm or Heal
Replenishment Of War: Successful crossbow Strikes give self 10 temporary Hit Points, or 20 temporary Hit Points on a critical hit, until the start of the next turn
Restorative Strike: (2) Successful melee Strike (+1 with crossbow) after healing self restores the same number of Hit Points to another willing creature
Sanctify Armament: (1) Touched weapon gains the holy or unholy trait and inflicts +2d6 HP spirit on opposed creatures for 1 hr
Sapping Symbol: (R) Raised symbol and a successful Religion check when taking melee damage inflicts enfeebled 1 on the attacker, or enfeebled 2 on a critical success, until the attacker moves away
Shared Replenishment: Can give the temporary Hit Points from Replenishment Of War to an ally within 10'
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Warpriest's Armor: Treats armor of 2 Bulk or higher as 1 Bulk lighter
Warpriest: Critical hits with a crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +29 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Cloistered Cleric: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolute Faith: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Master (Fortitude)
Premonition Of Avoidance: (R) Gives +2 save vs. the triggering hazard
Premonition Of Clarity: (R) Rerolls the triggering failed mental save with a +2 bonus once per hr
Raise Symbol: (1) Gives self +2 saves and changes successful saves vs. vitality and void into critical successes until the start of the next turn
Resolute Faith: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Shared Avoidance: Premonition Of Avoidance gives allies within 20' +2 vs. the triggering hazard
Shared Clarity: Premonition Of Clarity gives allies within 15' a +2 reroll vs. the triggering mental effect
Warpriest: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D10: 2; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; D7: 3; D8: 3; D9: 3; DC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Divine: +32 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 42 (wisdom; legendary)
Spells:
Agile Feet (D1 Foc): (1) Self gains +5' Speed and can move normally in difficult terrain for the remainder of the turn
Appearance Of Wealth (D1 Foc): (2) R30' 5' burst fascinates creatures attracted to wealth in a 20' radius while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 action; critical success negates)
Artistic Flourish (D4 Foc): (2) R15' Target weapon or skill tool becomes impressive and gains +1 attack or checks for 10 min (heightened 7th gives +2 bonus; 10th gives +2 bonus)
Athletic Rush (D1 Foc): (1) Self gains +10' Speed and +2 Athletics for 1 rd and can immediately Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim
Bit Of Luck (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Willing target can use the better of 2 rolls on a save within 1 min once per target per day
Captivating Adoration (D4 Foc): (2) Fascinates targets in a 15' emanation for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 action, then gives immunity for 1 hr; critical success negates and gives immunity for 1 hr; critical failure also improves attitude by 1 step) (heightened +1 increases the radius by 15')
Charming Touch (D1 Foc): (1) Touched becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions for 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful)
Cloak Of Shadow (D1 Foc): (1) 20' emanation around willing touched reduces bright light to dim and conceals the target for 1 min; the target can shed the cloak, and the spell ends if another picks it up
Commanding Lash (D4 Foc): (1) R100' Target harmed by self's most recent action obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 rd once per target per hr (save Will (-2 if frightened, stupefied, or suffering persistent damage) negates; critical failure target uses all actions on its next turn to obey)
Competitive Edge (D4 Foc): (1) Self gains +1 attack and skill checks, increasing to +3 immediately after a foe within 20' critically succeeds on the same, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 7th increases bonuses to +2 and +4)
Creative Splash (D1 Foc): (2) R30' 5' burst randomly inflicts one of dazzled for 1 rd, enfeebled 1 for 1 rd, frightened 1, or clumsy 1 for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts dazzled for 1 min, enfeebled 2 for 1 rd, frightened 2, or clumsy 2 for 1 rd)
Cry Of Destruction (D1 Foc): (2) 15' cone inflicts 1d8 HP sonic, or 1d12 HP sonic if self has already damaged a foe this turn (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP or +1d12 HP)
Darkened Sight (D4 Foc): (2) R60' Target gains greater darkvision for 1 min
Dazzling Flash (D1 Foc): (2) 15' cone inflicts blinded for 1 rd (Interact action ends the effect) and dazzled for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts dazzled only for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure extends dazzled to 1 hr) (heightened 3rd extends effects to a 30' cone)
Death's Call (D1 Foc): (R) R20' Gives self temporary Hit Points for 1 min equal to 4 + the level of the triggering living creature that dies, or double that for an undead creature that is destroyed
Delusional Pride (D4 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts -1 attacks and skill checks until end of its turn on a target that fails an attack or skill check, or -2 if it fails twice, for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 24 hr)
Destructive Aura (D4 Foc): (2) 15' emanation inflicts -2 resistances for 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts an additional -2 resistances)
Disperse Into Air (D4 Foc): (R) After taking the triggering damage, self becomes air with no actions and immunity to attacks until the end of the turn, then reforms anywhere within 15'
Downpour (D4 Foc): (2) R120' 30' burst extinguishes non-magical flames, gives concealment and fire resistance 10, and damages creatures with a water weakness for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +2 fire resistance)
Dreamer's Call (D4 Foc): (2) R30' Target obeys a suggestion for 1 action and suffers fascinated until the end of its next turn (save Will inflicts fascinated only; critical success negates; critical failure prevents the target from taking other actions)
Enduring Might (D4 Foc): (R) Gives self resistance 12 to the triggering damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Eradicate Undeath (D4 Foc): (2) 30' cone inflicts 4d12 HP vitality to undead (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Face In The Crowd (D1 Foc): (1) Self gains +2 Deception and Stealth to blend into a crowd and ignores difficult terrain from crowds for 1 min (heightened 3rd extends the range to 10' and affects 10 creatures)
Fire Ray (D1 Foc): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP fire, or double HP on a critical hit; others who end their turns in the target's space suffer 1d6 HP fire until the end of the target's turn (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP to target and +1d6 HP to others)
Flame Barrier (D4 Foc): (R) R60' Target gains fire resistance 15 against the triggering fire damage (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance)
Glimpse The Truth (D4 Foc): (1) Successful counteract attempts in a 30' emanation allow self to see through illusions for 1 rd (heightened 7th allows others to see through illusions)
Harm (D1): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) suffers 1d10 HP void (save basic Fortitude); undead instead regain 1d10 HP, or 1d10+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d10 HP; undead regain +8 HP with 2 actions)
Heal (D1): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) regains 1d10 HP, or 1d10+8 HP with 2 actions; undead instead suffer 1d10 HP vitality (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d10 HP; restores +8 HP with 2 actions)
Healer's Blessing (D1 Foc): (1) R30' Healing spells affecting the target restore +2 HP for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +2 HP)
Hurtling Stone (D1 Foc): (1) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push, or double HP and a 10' push on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Ignite Ambition (D1 Foc): (R) R60' Target suffers -4 to resist the triggering attempt to convince it to advance its ambitions (save Will inflicts -2 resistance; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts automatic compliance)
Know The Enemy (D4 Foc): (R) Allows using the better of 2 rolls on a Recall Knowledge check to remember a target's abilities during initiative or immediately after inflicting damage
Localized Quake (D4 Foc): (2) Choice of a 15' emanation or 15' cone inflicts 4d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save basic Reflex also negates knocked prone) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Lucky Break (D4 Foc): (R) Allows self to reroll a triggering failed save once per 10 min
Magic's Vessel (D1 Foc): (1) Touched gains +1 saves while sustained for up to 1 min; subsequent casting sustains the spell and gives the target resistance to spell damage equal to the cast spell's rank
Malignant Sustenance (D4 Foc): (2) Touched undead gains fast healing 7 for 1 min (heightened +1 gives fast healing +2)
Moonbeam (D1 Foc): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts dazzled for 1 rd and 2d6 HP fire that counts as silver, or dazzled for 1 min and double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Mystic Beacon (D4 Foc): (1) R30' Gives heightened +1 effects to the next damage or healing spell cast by the target until the start of the next turn
Nature's Bounty (D4 Foc): (1) Creates a fruit or vegetable that counts as a meal and restores 3d10+12 Hit Points if eaten within 1 min (heightened +1 restores +6 Hit Points)
Overstuff (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Target suffers sickened 1 and -10' Speed until no longer sickened (save Fortitude target can use an action to end the sickened condition; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2)
Perfected Body (D4 Foc): (R) Improves the triggering save result vs. a physical effect from critical failure to failure or from failure to success
Perfected Mind (D1 Foc): (1) Allows self an additional Will save vs. a mental effect once per effect
Precious Metals (D4 Foc): (1) Transforms touched metal item into cold iron, copper, gold, iron, silver, or steel for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +2 Hardness; heightened 8th can transform into adamantine or dawnsilver)
Protector's Sacrifice (D1 Foc): (R) R30' Transfers 3 HP damage of the triggering attack from target to self (heightened +1 transfers +3 HP)
Protector's Sphere (D4 Foc): (2) 15' emanation gives resistance 3 to all damage to self and allies while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 gives +1 resistance)
Pulse Of Civilization (D4 Foc): (2) R25 miles; reveals information about settlements and gives +2 to Recall Knowledge and Gather Information about them, or +22 if untrained, for 8 hr (heightened 5th increases the range to 100 miles; 7th increases the range to 500 miles and the bonus to +3 or +23)
Pushing Gust (D1 Foc): (2) R500' Pushes target away 10' (save Fortitude pushes 5'; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 10' and knocks prone)
Read Fate (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Successful DC 6 GM flat check gives a one-word clue to the target's short-term fate
Rebuke Death (D4 Foc): (1) 1 target in a 20' emanation (2 or 3 actions affect 2 or 3 targets) regains 3d6 HP and recovers from the dying condition without increasing its wounded condition (heightened +1 restores +1d6 HP)
Retributive Pain (D4 Foc): (R) R30' Inflicts half the triggering damage to self on the attacker as mental HP
Safeguard Secret (D4 Foc): (2) R30' Self and allies gain +4 skill checks to conceal a specified piece of knowledge for 1 hr
Savor The Sting (D1 Foc): (1) Touch inflicts 1d4 HP mental and 1d4 HP persistent mental and gives self +1 attack and skill checks vs. the target while persistent damage continues (save Will inflicts half initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Scholarly Recollection (D1 Foc): (R) Allows self to use the better of 2 rolls on the triggering Seek or trained Recall Knowledge check
Shared Nightmare (D4 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 action each rd for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused on self for 1 action next turn; critical success inflicts confused on self for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts confused for 1 min)
Soothing Words (D1 Foc): (1) R30' Gives the target +1 Will and +2 vs. emotion effects for 1 min and attempts to counteract an existing emotion effect (heightened 5th gives +2 Will and +3 vs. emotion effects)
Sudden Shift (D1 Foc): (R) Self Steps and becomes concealed until the end of the next turn after the triggering foe melee attack miss
Sweet Dream (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Willing target who sleeps for 1 min gains +1 intelligence-based skill checks, +1 charisma-based skill checks, or +5' Speed for 59 min (heightened 4th gives +2 skill checks; 7th gives +3 skill checks
Take Its Course (D4 Foc): (2) Touched gains an immediate save with a +2 or -2 modifier vs. an affliction, or an immediate DC 5 or 20 flat check against persistent poison damage (save Will negates) (heightened 7th affects multiple afflictions and poisons affecting the target)
Tempt Fate (D4 Foc): (R) R120' Gives the target +1 on the triggering save and turns a normal success into a critical success or a normal failure into a critical failure (heightened 8th gives +2 on the save)
Tidal Surge (D1 Foc): (1) R60' Moves the target 10' over ground or 20' in water (save Fortitude negates)
Touch Of Obedience (D1 Foc): (1) Touch inflicts stupefied 2 until the end of the next turn once per target per hr (save Will inflicts stupefied 1 until the end of the next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 min and prone)
Touch Of The Moon (D4 Foc): (1) Target emits dim light in a 20' radius and cycles through benefits each rd for 1 min: no benefit; +1 attack and +4 damage; +1 attack, +4 damage, +1 Armor Class, and +1 saves; +1 Armor Class and +1 saves
Touch Of Undeath (D1 Foc): (1) Touch inflicts 1d6 HP void and half healing for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical success inflicts double HP and half healing for 1 min) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Traveler's Transit (D4 Foc): (2) Self gains a 25' climb Speed or a 25' swim Speed for 5 min (heightened 5th allows choosing a 25' fly Speed)
Trickster's Twin (D4 Foc): (2) R30' Target believes that self is in a location up to 100' distant for 1 min or until succeeding at a Will save in response to interacting with the illusion or to the illusion performing a nonsensical or hostile action (save Will no subsequent Will save is necessary; critical success negates; critical failure requires critical success on a Will save to end the spell)
Unimpeded Stride (D1 Foc): (1) Frees self from magical holds of a rank less than or equal to the spell rank and allows a Stride that ignores difficult terrain and Speed penalties
Unity (D4 Foc): (R) R30' Allows allies to use self saving throw vs. the triggering spell or ability
Veil Of Confidence (D1 Foc): (1) Reduces frightened conditions on self by 1 for 1 min; critical failure on a subsequent save ends the spell and decreases the frightened condition by 1
Vibrant Thorns (D1 Foc): (1) Unarmed and adjacent melee attacks on self inflict 1 HP piercing on the attacker for 1 min; casting a vitality spell increases the damage to 1d6 HP for 1 turn (heightened +1 inflicts +1 HP, or +1d6 HP after casting a vitality spell)
Vital Luminance (D4 Foc): (1) 30' light emanation inflicts 2 HP vitality on successful undead attackers, increasing by 2 HP each rd for 1 min; self can end the spell early to heal a living creature or damage an undead creature by double the current damage HP (heightened +1 inflicts +0.5 HP initially and for each increase)
Waking Nightmare (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 and +1 HP mental from successful Strikes (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3; failure while sleeping also inflicts paralyzed for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 HP)
Weapon Surge (D1 Foc): (1) Held weapon gains +1 attack and inflicts +1d6 HP spirit on the next attack before the start of the next turn (heightened 5th inflicts +2d6 HP; 9th inflicts +3d6 HP)
Whispering Quiet (D1 Foc): (2) R60' 15' burst mutes speech, requiring others over 5' away to succeed on a DC 42 Perception to hear, for 1 min
Word Of Freedom (D4 Foc): (1) R30' Suppresses a confused, frightened, grabbed, paralyzed, or restrained condition affecting the target for 1 rd
Word Of Truth (D1 Foc): (1) Gives +2 Diplomacy and causes a glowing symbol of Abadar to appear when self speaks true statements of up to 25 words while sustained for up to 1 min
Zeal For Battle (D4 Foc): (R) R10' Allows self and an ally to each use the higher of their initiative rolls
Magic Notes:
Advanced Domain (Air): Knows the Disperse Into Air divine spell
Advanced Domain (Ambition): Knows the Competitive Edge divine spell
Advanced Domain (Cities): Knows the Pulse Of Civilization divine spell

Cloistered Cleric: Spell Legendary (Divine)

Domain Initiate (Zeal): Knows the Weapon Surge divine spell/Has a focus pool
Harming Hands: Increases Harm die type to d10
Healing Hands: Increases Heal die type to d10
Maker Of Miracles: +1 10th rank spell slot
Miraculous Spell: Has 1 10th-rank spell slot
Warpriest: Spell Master (Divine)
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Avatar's Audience: Can speak for Abadar, conduct the Commune ritual to contact Abadar without cost, and use Plane Shift to travel to Abadar's realm once per day
Avatar's Protection: (R) Casts a prepared Avatar spell and changes the triggering critical hit to self to a normal hit
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Cast Down: (1) Subsequent single-target damaging Harm or Heal also inflicts knocked prone (save negates; critical failure also inflicts -10 Speed for 1 min)
Castigating Weapon: Inflicting damage using Harm or Heal with Divine Castigation gives weapons and unarmed Strikes the holy or unholy trait and additional spirit damage equal to the spell rank until the end of turn
Cleric Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Communal Healing: Casting Heal on a single target restores HP equal to the spell rank to self or another target
Cremate Undead: Heal cast upon undead also inflicts persistent fire damage equal to the spell rank
Defensive Recovery: (1) Subsequent single-target healing also gives the target +2 Armor Class and saves for 1 rd
Deity's Protection: Casting a domain spell gives self resistance equal to the spell rank to all damage until the start of the next turn
Deity: Has access to Illusory Object, Creation, and Planar Palace spells
Directed Channel: Can direct the effects of an area Harm or Heal into a 60' cone
Divine Apex: Can give a worn magic item the apex trait for a chosen attribute during daily prep
Divine Castigation: Can add the holy or unholy trait to Harm and Heal spells to inflict spirit damage
Divine Infusion: (1) Target of a subsequent single-target Harm or Heal inflicts +1d6 HP (+2d6 HP or +3d6 HP if cast at 5th or 8th rank) with melee attacks until the end of its next turn
Divine Weapon: (F) Using a divine spell slot causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP spirit, or +2d4 HP vs. opposed holy or unholy creatures, until the end of the turn once per turn
Domain Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Ebb And Flow: (1) Subsequent Harm or Heal harms 1 target and heals another
Echoing Channel: (1) Subsequent 2-action Harm or Heal cast on a single target also causes 1-action effects on another creature
Eternal Bane: R15' Aura gives continuous rank 10 Bane effects; can dismiss it for 1 min
Eternal Blessing: R15' Aura gives continuous rank 10 Bless effects; can dismiss it for 1 min
Fast Channel: Can use 2 actions to cast a 3-action Harm or Heal
Fortunate Relief: Counteract attempts from healing spells gain the better of 2 rolls
Harmful Font: Can cast Harm at rank 9 an additional 6 times per day
Healing Font: Can cast Heal at rank 9 an additional 6 times per day
Heroic Recovery: (1) Subsequent single-target Heal also gives the target +5 Speed, +1 attack, and +1 HP damage until the end of its next turn and allows the target to stand from prone immediately without triggering reactions
Improved Swift Banishment: Can sacrifice any 5th rank or higher prepared spell to inflict Swift Banishment with a -2 save penalty
Martyr: (1) Subsequent healing spell also transfers 1d8 HP per spell rank from self to target
Miraculous Possibility: Can leave a spell slot free during daily prep to later cast any spell 2 ranks lower
Panic The Dead: Heal also inflicts frightened 1 on intelligent undead (save negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing until the start of the next turn)
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Remediate: (F) 3-action Harm or Heal attempts to counteract a divine effect once per hr
Restorative Channel: Can cast Cleanse Affliction, Clear Mind, Sound Body, or Sure Footing in place of a prepared Heal
Resurrectionist: Restoring Hit Points to a dying or dead target also gives fast healing 5 for 1 min or until the target is knocked unconscious
Sacred Ground: 1 min prayer creates a 30 min burst that restores 20 HP to creatures who remain in the area for 10 min once per 10 min
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores HP equal to the spell rank to self
Selective Energy: Can choose 5 creatures to be unaffected when casting an area Harm or Heal
Shield Of Faith: Casting a domain spell gives +1 AC until the start of the next turn
Spellshape Channel: (F) Applies a 1-action spellshape action to Harm or Heal
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Surging Focus: (F) Seeing an ally reduced to 0 HP restores 1 Focus Point to self once per day
Swift Banishment: (R) Expends a prepared Banishment with the triggering critical hit on an extraplanar foe
Versatile Font: Can use the extra spell slots from Harming Font or Healing Font for either Harm or Heal
Void Siphon: Critical failures vs. self Harm inflict drained 1
Zealous Rush: (R) Can Stride 10' while casting a 1-action spell on self, or 25' while casting a spell that requires more actions
Notes

Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 141 allocated
Cleric Divine Font Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Cleric Doctrine Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Cleric Sanctification Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
